name: test_launch_with_proxy
description:
使用代理 IP 运行浏览器
    前提是安装了 3party/ 下的 proxy_pool
descriptionHtml:
使用代理 IP 运行浏览器
前提是安装了 3party/ 下的 proxy_pool
statusMessage: playwright._impl._errors.Error: BrowserType.launch: proxy.server: expected string, got object
statusTrace:
@pytest.mark.asyncio
    async def test_launch_with_proxy():
        """
        使用代理 IP 运行浏览器
        前提是安装了 3party/ 下的 proxy_pool
        """
        try:
            proxy_ip = ProxyPoolHelper().get_region_proxy('湖南')
            proxy = {'server': proxy_ip}
        except Exception as ex:
            print('get proxy ip failed: %s', ex)
            proxy = None
    
        async with async_playwright() as playwright:
>           async with PlaywrightCommon(proxy=proxy).launch_browser_mgr(playwright) as (_, _, page):
